siteMetadata.title: Life with a Twist of Lemon

node.excerpt: Dear Listener, Stan had a rough week. He returned all of his shoes, his trusty robovac broke and he had a rough customer support experience. Mastering Minimalism this week we talk about clearing out your storage spaces. Life Tip is to give yourself an extra day after travel…

tags.name: life with a twist of lemon

node.excerpt: Dear Listener, Today Jon is recording from the St. Louis area, we try to find out if there is a specific St. Louis cuisine and get an update on Stan’s shoe decision. Stan also tells us about his robocalls vacuum and per request from one of our favorite listeners (Mrs. Lemon), we…
